data.name: Anime Prison - Gisele's Escape
data.detailed_description:
In Anime Prison - Gisele's Escape, you play as Gisele, an anime girl who was wrongfully imprisoned for burning down an orphanage. Your goal is simple - to escape from prison! In order to do this, you must complete various quests for the other inmates as they try and help you escape. These quests range from collecting items for them, fighting enemies and bosses, exploring the prison grounds, and many more!

Main features
  • Cute anime art style
  • Many unique and enjoyable characters
  • Many quests to complete, including both side quests, and main quests
  • Banger soundtrack by Dark Fantasy Studio
  • Ability to freely move the camera around, use this as you wish :)
data.about_the_game:
In Anime Prison - Gisele's Escape, you play as Gisele, an anime girl who was wrongfully imprisoned for burning down an orphanage. Your goal is simple - to escape from prison! Main features

data.short_description: A story based action-adventure game where you play as an Anime girl, Gisele who was wrongfully imprisoned for burning down an orphanage. Fight your way through various enemies and complete quests as you try and figure out how to escape from prison in Anime Prison - Gisele's Escape!

content_descriptors.notes:
- Cartoon violence, blood and gore, sexual themes, suggestive and strong language, mature humor, general mature themes including incest.

Please note that all characters in this game are depicted as being age 18 or older.
